sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-form
      :model="ruleForm"
      ref="ruleForm"
      label-width="100px"
      class="demo-dynamic"
  >
    <el-form-item
        prop="email"
        label="邮箱"
        type="email"
        v-model="email"
    >
      <el-input v-model="ruleForm.email"></el-input>
    </el-form-item>
  </el-form>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    var emailCheck = (rule, value, callback) => {
      if (value === '') {
        callback(new Error('请输入邮箱'))
      } else if (email_blur(value)) {
        callback(new Error('两次输入密码不一致!'))
      } else {
        callback()
      }
    }
    return {
      message: '',
      ruleForm: {
        email:''
      },
      rules: {
        email: [{ required:true,validator: emailCheck, trigger: 'blur' }],
      },
    }
  },
  methods: {
    email_blur(email) {
      var verify = /^\w[-\w.+]*@([A-Za-z0-9][-A-Za-z0-9]+\.)+[A-Za-z]{2,14}/;
      if (!verify.test(this.email)) {
        return false;
      } else {
        return true;
      }
    },
  },
}
</script>
